application_name: SunVillas - Real Estate Platform for Hot Countries

testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder content
steps: Verify multiple interactive elements exist (search bar, property cards, navigation menu)
Check for proper navigation structure with working links
Verify application shows real estate content, not just 'Vite + React' placeholder
Confirm presence of property listings, search functionality, and user features
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays a fully functional real estate platform with property listings, search capabilities, and interactive features
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or lacks real estate functionality, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: UI Components Test
testCases.description: Test that UI components are properly implemented and functional
steps: Check for clickable buttons and verify they respond to clicks
Look for search forms and input fields
Verify navigation menu exists and is functional
Test responsive design elements on different screen sizes
Confirm presence of property cards, filters, and interactive elements
testCases.expectedOutcome: Multiple interactive UI components found and functional, including search, navigation, and property browsing features

testCases.name: Content Quality Test
testCases.description: Verify application has meaningful real estate content
steps: Check page has substantial content beyond placeholder text
Verify proper heading structure for real estate platform
Look for actual property listings and descriptions
Ensure professional appearance appropriate for real estate business
Confirm presence of location-specific content for hot countries
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application demonstrates real estate functionality with professional design and meaningful content

testCases.name: User Authentication - Login
testCases.description: Test user login functionality with valid credentials
steps: Verify successful login and redirect to dashboard
Check that user profile information is displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logs in and is redirected to authenticated dashboard with profile information visible

testCases.name: User Registration
testCases.description: Test new user registration process
steps: Fill in registration form with valid data
testCases.expectedOutcome: New user account is created successfully and user is automatically logged in

testCases.name: Property Search Functionality
testCases.description: Test property search with various filters and criteria
steps: Navigate to search page or use homepage search
Apply filters (price range, property type, amenities)
Execute search and verify results are displayed
Check that results match search criteria
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search returns relevant property listings matching the specified criteria with proper filtering

testCases.name: Property Detail View
testCases.description: Test detailed property information display
steps: Navigate to a property listing from search results
Click on a property to view details
Verify property information is displayed (title, description, amenities)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property details page shows comprehensive information including photos, amenities, pricing, and booking options

testCases.name: Property Booking Flow
testCases.description: Test complete booking process from property selection to confirmation
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete booking flow works from property selection through payment confirmation

testCases.name: Host Dashboard Functionality
testCases.description: Test host-specific features and property management
steps: Verify property management interface is displayed
Test property analytics and performance metrics
Verify ability to manage property settings
testCases.expectedOutcome: Host dashboard displays property management tools, booking requests, and analytics

testCases.name: Real-time Messaging System
testCases.description: Test messaging functionality between guests and hosts
steps: Start new conversation or open existing one
testCases.expectedOutcome: Messaging system allows communication between users with real-time updates

testCases.name: Property Favorites System
testCases.description: Test ability to save and manage favorite properties
steps: Browse properties and click 'Add to Favorites' on a property
Verify property appears in favorites list
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can successfully add, view, and remove properties from their favorites list

testCases.name: User Profile Management
testCases.description: Test user profile viewing and editing capabilities
steps: Verify profile information is displayed correctly
Save changes and verify updates persist
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can view and successfully update their profile information

testCases.name: Navigation Structure Test
testCases.description: Test main navigation and routing functionality
steps: Verify all major pages are accessible (Home, Search, Dashboard, Profile)
Test deep linking to specific pages
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation elements work correctly and pages are accessible via proper routing

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Check that content adapts properly to screen size
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays and functions properly across all screen sizes with appropriate responsive behavior

testCases.name: Advanced Search Filters
testCases.description: Test advanced filtering options in property search
steps: Filter by property type (villa, apartment, etc.)
Verify results update correctly with each filter
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search filters work correctly and results update appropriately when filters are applied

testCases.name: Payment Processing Interface
testCases.description: Test payment interface and processing flow
steps: Complete booking flow to payment step
testCases.expectedOutcome: Payment interface displays correctly and processes test payments successfully

testCases.name: Location and Weather Information
testCases.description: Test location-specific information and weather data display
testCases.expectedOutcome: Location pages display relevant information including weather data and local attractions

testCases.name: Investment Analytics Dashboard
testCases.description: Test investment tracking and analytics features
steps: Login as host with investment properties
testCases.expectedOutcome: Investment analytics display comprehensive financial data and performance metrics

testCases.name: Notification System
testCases.description: Test notification display and management
testCases.expectedOutcome: Notification system displays alerts and allows proper management of notification status

testCases.name: Multi-language Support
testCases.description: Test language switching functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Language switching works correctly and preferences are maintained across sessions

testCases.name: Currency Conversion
testCases.description: Test currency selection and price conversion
steps: Switch between different currencies (USD, EUR, GBP)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Currency conversion works accurately and preferences are saved

testCases.name: Error Handling and Validation
testCases.description: Test application error handling and form validation
steps: Test form submission with invalid data
Try accessing protected pages without authentication
Check that application recovers gracefully from errors
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with appropriate user feedback and recovery mechanisms

testCases.name: Application Performance
testCases.description: Test application loading speed and performance
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and provides smooth user experience with reasonable performance

testCases.name: Data Persistence Test
testCases.description: Test that user data and preferences persist correctly
steps: Login and make changes to profile
Verify all changes and preferences are maintained
testCases.expectedOutcome: User data, preferences, and session state persist correctly across login sessions

testCases.name: Basic Security Test
testCases.description: Test basic security measures and access controls
steps: Try accessing protected routes without authentication
Verify user can only access their own data
Check that sensitive information is not exposed in client
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application properly protects routes and user data with appropriate access controls

test_execution_notes.browser_compatibility: Test in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
test_execution_notes.mobile_testing: Test on iOS Safari and Android Chrome
test_execution_notes.test_data_requirements: Use provided test users from test_users.json
test_execution_notes.environment_setup: Ensure backend server is running on localhost:3000
test_execution_notes.critical_failures: Tests marked as 'high' priority must pass for application to be considered functional
